summary: Ziyaret durumu 3 durumlu sistem (pending, visited, not_visited) ve PDF raporu testi tamamlandı. Tüm backend ve frontend testleri başarılı. CustomerCard onClick handler eksikliği düzeltildi.
passed_tests: Backend - Login success (test@example.com)
Backend - Get customers list
Backend - Create visit with pending status
Backend - Update visit to 'visited' status
Backend - Update visit to 'not_visited' with reason
Backend - Payment fields cleared on not_visited status
Backend - Get visits with status field
Backend - PDF report download
Backend - Get today's customers
Frontend - Login and Today page loads
Frontend - Customer cards display with correct status badges
Frontend - Progress bar shows correct counts (visited/not_visited/total)
Frontend - Customer card navigation to detail page
Frontend - 'Ziyaret Edildi' button works
Frontend - 'Ziyaret Edilmedi' button works
Frontend - Reason required for 'not_visited' status (validation)
Frontend - Payment section disabled when 'not_visited' selected
Frontend - Payment type and amount fields work
Frontend - Quality rating (star) works
Frontend - PDF download works
Frontend - Status badges show correct colors (green/red/gray)
Frontend - Customer card left border color matches status
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.jsx - Added onClick handler to CustomerCard for navigation
/app/tests/test_visit_status.py - Created new test file for visit status system
seed_data_creation: Visit records created/updated during testing for Elif Bakkaliye (not_visited) and Mehmet Gıda (visited)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Ziyaret durumu 3 durumlu sistem çalışıyor: pending (gri badge, gri kenar), visited (yeşil badge, yeşil kenar), not_visited (kırmızı badge, kırmızı kenar). Ziyaret edilmedi seçildiğinde sebep zorunlu ve tahsilat alanı pasif. PDF raporu kompakt tablo formatında indiriliyor. CustomerCard onClick handler TodayPage'de eklendi.
